__e: I know, your room's like some holy land, forbidden to fathers, but I thought I'd make you some shelves.
You said kids shouldn't hear radios.
Tonight I'll be watching a show rated M.A., and that stands for "Mature Audiences," buster.
I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.
Because you deliberately did something I asked you not to.
These 5 years you condemned me for haven't finished yet.
Because a sexual relationship between two fellow bureau employees is strictly against the rules.

By 5:00 in the morning, we're in Kansas City... where we enjoy a leisurely breakfast at the airport... and by 8:00, we're on a plane to someplace warm... where it's against the fucking law to rain, okay?
In their own way, yes, which the church forbid.

But it seems a certain private detective... in Hollywood, California managed to get a shot of her... doing something so perverse, so depraved... with one of her famous love slaves that the photograph has been banned... in all 48 states!
You should know better by now than to be reading in my classroom.
The locals are calling for a bounty, but wolf hunting is illegal in this state, so we're asking folks to just keep an eye out and, uh... report any sightings.
